title: Classification of matter
wuzhitishi: Depending on whether it consists of the same substance
chunjingwutishi: Depending on whether it consists of the same element
hunhewutishi: Classification according to the size of the dispersed particles
danzhitishi: Classify according to the nature of the element
huahewutishi: Whether it contains carbon (CO, CO₂, H₂CO₃ and carbonates are inorganic compounds)
wujihuahewutishi: Classified according to the nature of the compound
yanghuawutishi: Classified according to the constituent elements of the oxide
